item.title: The Interaction Changes Everything: Treating AI Agents as Collaborators, Not Automation
item.description: At Microsoft Ignite 2025, the focus was on transforming AI agents into collaborators rather than just automation tools. Amanda Silver and Karl Piteira discussed how this shift enhances engineering workflows, allowing developers to work alongside intelligent agents like GitHub Copilot. One case study highlighted how a complex migration project was completed in under 2 hours with 80-90% accuracy, compared to the usual 4-6 weeks. This success stemmed from treating AI as a partner, not just a…
